name: wMusic
body:
### wMusic Overview.
wMusic is a system which allow your RaspberryPi, to stream music from Spotify directly into your hi-fi system.
If you have 2 RaspberryPi, one can act like a bridge and the other one (plug on your hi-fi system) can act like a receiver. It's like the Sonos system but for free ;) !
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
